name: ASTROPUZZ
description:
Farm the asteroids with dashed lines for scrap by flying next to them. You have 4 different weapons (keys Space, V, C, X). Asteroids can only be destroyed by weapons with matching signatures. The asteroids signature is hidden in the beginning and can be scanned in the space station (or guessed).

When the space station approaches, you will see a portal on the left and right border. On the space station use the arrow keys and space to navigate.
